description:
Slime Floods!

Slimer is out of money and hungry. Slimer asks his friend Manx the cat if he will share is food. Manx refuses to share and sends Slimer on his way. Slimer runs into his friend Rudy. Rudy offers to pay him to clear the snow out of Clinton Street. Slimer starts his job, but finds it hard to shovel the snow. Luckily, his slime melts snow. Slimer dances his way all over Clinton Street melting all the snow. Unfortunately Slimer melts all the snow and creates a flood. The water comes rushing down the street. Thinking quickly Slimer puts on his mittens and creates a dam of snow. The water rushes towards a construction site. At the construction site Slimer sees Manx eating in a dumpster. He tries to warn Manx, but he doesn't listen and gets caught in the flood.

Slimer gets his money from Rudy and sees the Junior Ghostbusters running off to a new ice skating rink. It turns out that the flood water froze at the construction site and made a ice rink. And the kids get up to the ice rink by climbing up an ice block which has Manx frozen in it..

Improving Business

Slimer visits his favorite restaurant only to have the owner Rafael to kick him out for hurting business. However the owner invites Manx the cat in to have some dinner. The cook, Luigi, kicks the cat away for playing in the spaghetti. Luigi makes a special meal for Slimer. Rafael and the cat hear Slimer eating his dinner and the Manx gets an idea. If he can scare Slimer away the owner will let him eat anything he wants. So Manx dresses up as a ghost and scares Luigi and Rafael. Slimer thinks he can stop this new ghost but Manx sneaks up behind him and scares him. Manx jumps at Slimer, but goes right through him. Slimer realizes that the ghost is Manx and so does the owner. Manx wrecks the restaurant throwing plates everywhere trying to hit Slimer. Luigi gives Slimer a big bag of catnip. Slimer pours the catnip over Manx who goes crazy and bounces all over the restaurant. Rafeal kicks Manx out into the alley.

Rafael is distraught, his restaurant is ruined, but Slimer can help. They tape a table and some plates together and serve a new special "Chicken-Catch-A-Cat-Tory."
name: Slime Floods!

name: Zio Paperone e la ricerca spaziale

description:
Outlaw Frank Aaron, a police officer in Blackstone City, carries a curse in the form of severe Lycanthropy - Frank is a werewolf. Sharing the secret of his plight with Dr. Carl Sanchez and his homicide partner Daniel Whitman, Frank hopes to control or end his curse in order to join "The Special Division" which deals in superhuman and paranormal cases to help those like himself.

Frank Aaron is a cop in Blackstone with a dark secret as he does his job hoping he does not do more harm than good. Frank and his partner, Dan Whitman, are assigned to a stakeout of a deal between unknown characters.
name: Lethal Instinct

description: As the companion to THE BIG BOOK OF CONSPIRACIES, this intriguing text examines the strange phenomena and bizarre happenings that have occurred around the world and in outer space. Using sequential art and text to present these mysterious occurrences in an easily accessible manner, this black and white volume touches on such legendary curiosities as alien abductions, crop circles, alternate dimensions, space/time anomalies, synchronicity, and UFO sightings. Never preaching but simply introducing facts and theories, THE BIG BOOK OF THE UNEXPLAINED is a thought-provoking and entertaining text on paranormal mysteries.

volume.name: The Big Book of the Unexplained

description: From the gangs of ancient India to the modern mafia, THE BIG BOOK OF THUGS offers a historical and insightful overview of the most notorious gangs and mobs since the beginning of time. Analyzing the infamous group dynamic, this enrossing book delves into the immoral actions and tainted motivations of these organized packs. But neither romanticizing nor condemning their actions, this black and white comic text is an accurate portrait of the toughest mobs ever to walk the mean streets and rule the back alleys.

volume.name: The Young Witches III: Empire of Sin

description: By Barreiro/Solano Lopez; with Lillian possessed by Set, Agatha has one chance to invade the orgiastic ceremony and free her sister witch!
name: Three

volume.name: The Young Witches III: Empire of Sin
The Young Witches III: Empire of Sin

description: By Barreiro/Solano Lopez; haunted by nightmares, Lillian and Agatha are hypnotized, only to encounter the goddess Ishtar!
name: One

volume.name: The Young Witches IV: The Eternal Dream
The Young Witches IV: The Eternal Dream

description: By Barreiro/Solano Lopez; fantasy and reality blur as our heroes confront the villains in one of the most hallucinatory orgy sequences ever set to comics!
name: Three

volume.name: The Young Witches IV: The Eternal Dream
The Young Witches V: The Legacy

description: By F. Solano Lopez, Pol, and R. Barreiro. In love with a young villager, Lilith gives the light to Lulabeth, who quickly reaches a happy puberty. It soon becomes evident that Lulabeth has not inherited her mother's powers. Filled with guilt that leads to madness, she kills her mother to procreate with her father. From this encounter Bethanny is born, one of the most powerful witches in the lineage. Possessing an irresistible beauty, Bethanny soon learns to deceive men and to use them at her convenience. But her excessive confidence results in a premature death. An old druid magician revives her sufficiently to pass the light to Tamara. Young Witches is the best-selling Eros comic ever, and this volume features the most sex and richest detailed halftoned art so far.
name: Two

volume.name: The Young Witches V: The Legacy

description:
The Silver Surfer receives a distress call from Shalla Bal that is cut short. He immediately returns home to Zenn-La, only to find that it has disappeared. He finds Zenn-La's research satellite and asks the scientists on board what has happened. They do not know, but then they are met by Moondragon, who does.

She is able to take the Surfer on the trail of the entity, which appears as a massive brain floating in space. It is protected by a force field and will not listen to the Surfer. Moondragon tells him that the being is in a dream state, and with her help the Surfer is able to go inside of it's mind.

Once inside, he finds Shalla Bal who tells him that they chose to be put under the beings protection, calling it the Great One. Without trouble from the outside universe, the Surfer decides to stay with Shalla. They live together happily for weeks until one day they throw a grand banquet for the Great One.

He instantly realizes that an outsider is among them and attacks the Surfer. The Surfer tries to reason with him but he keeps on attacking. The Surfer delivers a mortal blow to the Great One, who finally tells him it was fear that caused his attack. He tries to help the Great One, but the doctors are unable to save him.

Moondragon arrives and tells them that once he dies, so will Zenn-La. She cannot save him, but with the Surfer's help she can save Zenn-La. The Surfer returns to the outside world while Moondragon maintains a connection with Shalla on the inside.

He uses the power of a red giant star to power her Mind Gem, giving her the power to release the planet. But when she sends the Surfer in to get Shalla, the Great One dies and she is lost forever.

The Zenn-Lavians now hate the Surfer for taking the Great One and their Empress from them. He leaves the planet in sorrow while Moondragon scolds them, for the Surfer has saved them plenty of times and they would all be dead once again if not for him. But none of this is any consolation to the Surfer, who has lost his true love.
name: GN

description:
Another werewolf is discovered in Blackstone City, and the connection to Detective Dan becomes self-evident. His secret is out in the open and his friends rally to his side as they try to find a cure for his lycanthropy. Just as things seem to be going their way, life throws them a deadly curve in the road ahead. Who will survive, and who will perish? Find out in this exciting chapter of Lethal Instinct!

Frank and Dan recover from the last assignment. Another detective is assigned to the case.

Frank escapes a death-defying plunge into the river by the skin of his lycan teeth, and gives chase to the culprit who ran him off the road, only to end up face-to-face with Steven and his posse of armed thugs! Back in the forest, Ingrid and Josh plan their entrance into the nefarious 'Club D'. Plus, a new menace arrives in the form of a bounty hunter who specializes in hunting werewolves.

Frank survives the car's plunge into the river and chases after the driver of the other car. The gang's boss, Joshua, continues his mysterious activities.

In Greenwich Village, Tim Klass runs the APOCALYPSE DRAFTHOUSE, a wild, weird, nearly-bankrupt movie theater famous for its beer, pizza and all-night marathons where fading celebrities drink and carouse with movie geeks. But one thing just might turn it around: a mysterious, magical girl on the run, who can get people and matter to do the most amazing things. Her name: SYLVIA FAUST. And she's on the run from a past darker than any theater. A 1970s action star is supposed to host a three-movie kung fu marathon at the Apocalypse, but Tim just can't seem to get the guy sober. Can Sylvia Faust, the levitating mystery girl with the ability to change matter and minds, be the answer to his prayers?or the beginning of a nightmare? And should Tim hire her? Weird, romantic and snarky magical action from the creators of SWORD OF DRACULA and Marvel's STRANGE MAGIC, Greg Scott and Jason Henderson, with SOULCATCHER colorist Leslie Barkley.

Vinyl Info

Comes with a "special Flexi-disc musical" Vinyl insert with performances by Alan Moore and the Sinister Ducks, with a song called "The March of the Sinister Ducks", as well as Ty Templeton performing Teddy Payne and the Bluebears "A Right to the Blues". This should be between pages 16 and 17.

Songs:

  • The March of the Sinister Ducks (2 minutes and 37 seconds long)
  • Right to the Blues (3 minutes and 21 seconds long)

His life hanging by a thread after a complicated surgery, Frank's mind and body are in bitter conflict as his lycan traits threaten to extinguish his humanity. Joe is in despair as his duties at the department overwhelm him, while at the same time he tries to find out what happened to Dan.

Frank Aaron gets control of his life and the search continues for a missing cop.

In Greenwich Village, Tim Klass runs the Apocalypse Drafthouse, a wild, weird, nearly-bankrupt movie theater famous for its beer, pizza and all-night marathons where fading celebrities drink and carouse with movie geeks. But one thing just might turn it around: a mysterious, magical girl who can get people and matter to do the most amazing things. Her name? Sylvia Faust. And she's on the run from a past darker than any theater. Tim Klass already has a small army of young employees, and now he has to deal with his worst waitress ever, Sylvia Faust, who's depressed because she's found her father and he doesn't remember her. But when Tim comforts her with an escape into his favorite movies, Sylvia shows him how to make the escape a kind of reality. Weird and snarky magic romance from Greg Scott and Jason Henderson, with SOULCATCHER colorist Leslie Barkley.

While Frank and Joe intensify their search for Dan, Josh uses the powers of the black crystal on Dan! Meanwhile, Ingrid finally decides which side she will choose, but has her decision come too late?

Frank and the Captain intensify the search for a missing cop. A clue is discovered which begins to bear fruit. The gang's boss continues his experiments and Detective Ingrid Jensen has to choose sides.

• Freedom's Road (by Dez Skinn)

  • Laser Eraser and Pressbutton (by Pedro Henry and Steve Dillon)

  • Laser Eraser and Pressbutton (by Pedro Henry and Steve Dillon)

Joe and Frank receive an anonymous call with instructions about where Dan can be found, while Steve begins an investigation of his own. Furius (Josh) has waited long enough, and he finally confronts the other Werewolf (Frank). Can there be a winner to this bloody battle?

In this finale of Lethal Instinct, Frank has a showdown with the gang's boss, Joshua, and the police search for the missing cop.
